high_descs: Turn to your left and take a step towards the wall, then turn to your right and walk to the toilet
Pick up the empty toilet paper roll that is sitting on the back of the toilet
Continue to face the toilet, focus your attention to the toilet paper holder that is hanging on the wall to the left
Place the empty roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder
anns.task_desc: Place an empty toilet paper roll on a toilet paper holder

high_descs: Pick up the toilet paper roll from the back of the toilet.
Locate the toilet paper holder on the wall the the left
Place the toilet paper roll on the toilet paper holder.
anns.task_desc: Place the toilet paper roll onto the toilet paper holder.

high_descs: Walk to the left side of the toilet in front of you.
Pick up the empty roll of toilet paper from the top of the toilet.
Bend down towards the empty toilet paper holder.
Put the empty roll of toilet paper on the toilet paper holder.
anns.task_desc: Put an empty roll of toilet paper on a toilet paper holder.
